Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â«

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Set in small-town Alaska, 'Limbo' is the story of Joe Gastineau (David Strathairn), a fisherman traumatized by an accident at sea years before. Into Joe's landlocked life comes Donna de Angelo, a nightclub singer with a habit of picking rotten male companions, and her troubled teenage daughter Noelle, who's filled with a self-loathing and tired of her mother's relationships.

When Joe captains his ship on a mysterious sea voyage, the lives of the three characters are changed forever.

Against a backdrop of a vast, challenging wilderness, 'Limbo' tells the dramatic story of three people who come together to face their own demons and learn the very nature of risk.
